Original checksum: 0x4f

=====Creating Fixed EDID=====
Setting Manufacturer to APP
Setting Product Code to 9C7C
Setting Serial to 0
Setting Week of Manufacture to 10
Setting Year of Manufacture to 2012
Calculated checksum: 0x1a
Original checksum: 0x4f
Fixed EDID for Clover:
00FFFFFFFFFFFF0006107C9C000000000A160104952615780A0BB5A35955A0270C5054000000010101010101010101010101010101012E3680A070381F40302035007ED71000001A000000000000000000000000000000000000000000FE004C4720446973706C61790A2020000000FE004C503137335746342D53504633001A
